alert.note: Alert for New York (Manhattan) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 12:16PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, eastern Passaic, northwestern Union, southeastern Bergen, Essex and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1215 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morristown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Paterson, Passaic, Hoboken, Bloomfield, Hackensack, Orange, Bergenfield, Summit, Lyndhurst, Millburn, Rutherford, Secaucus and Harrison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
